title: REVERSIBLE JACQUARD WAISTCOAT
desc: Long, reversible and double-breasted chenille waistcoat with jacquard motif. This model is complete with grosgrain trims.• Slim fit• Geometric neckline• Double-breasted closure• Welt side slip pockets• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
